member.summary: Represents the arguments for the Content Changed event.

member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the previous content for TargetedContentChangedEventArgs has expired.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.TargetedContent.TargetedContentChangedEventArgs.GetDeferral
member.summary: Gets the deferral. Required for async handlers. The caller is responsible for calling Complete when the event is handled.
